org.gvsig.raster.wmts.ogc.impl.base

Class WMTSClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.wmts.ogc.impl.base.WMTSClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WMTSClient

    public class WMTSClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements WMTSClient

    Represents the class with the necessary logic to connect to a OGCWMTS and interpret the data
